trackOrder.pageInfoText: üí° Enter your order details above to track your motorcycle delivery in real-time. You'll see updates from confirmation to delivery!

howItWorks.step1Text: Browse our wide selection of motorcycles and find the perfect one for your trip.
howItWorks.step2Text: Select your rental dates, provide your details, and complete the secure payment.
howItWorks.step3Text: We deliver the motorcycle directly to your location at the specified time.
howItWorks.step4Text: We will deliver and pick up the motorcycle right at your location with no extra fee.

home.heroTagline: Premium Motorbikes, Free Delivery, Seamless Adventures.
home.rentalBonus: Rent for 3+ hours and get charged for 1 full day.
home.smartBookingDesc: Book in seconds via our Chatbot. No complex selection required‚Äîsimply leave your details.
home.doorstepDeliveryDesc: Free pickup and delivery within a 10km radius in Phu Quoc, Nha Trang, and Ha Giang.
home.flexiblePaymentDesc: We accept Cash, Bank Transfer, PayPal, or Credit Card swipe upon delivery.
home.noBikesAvailable: No motorbikes are available at the moment. Please come back later.
home.discoveringVietnam: Discovering Vietnam on two wheels with RentnRide.
home.review1Text: RentnRide made my Ha Giang Loop adventure unforgettable! The manual motorbike was powerful enough for the steep passes, and having the helmet and rain gear included saved me so much hassle. Highly recommended!
home.review2Text: I loved the chatbot booking feature! It took less than 2 minutes to rent a scooter. They delivered it right to my resort in Phu Quoc for free. The motorbike was new, clean, and fuel-efficient.
home.review3Text: As an avid cyclist, finding RentnRide was a game-changer. The variety of motorbikes caters to all preferences, and the ease of renting makes planning spontaneous rides a breeze. Thank you, RentnRide, for turning my biking dreams into a reality!
home.review4Text: RentnRide has nailed the perfect combination of convenience and quality. Renting a motorbike has never been this easy, and the motorbikes themselves are in top-notch condition. Kudos to RentnRide for providing a hassle-free biking experience!
